message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but $120 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.

I understand that $120 might be a bit steep for you, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $110. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I can offer $95 for the product. I'm willing to make a compromise, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I can offer it to you for $105. It's still a good deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $105 is still a bit above my budget. I can offer $100 for the product. I'm really interested in making this deal work, but I need to stay within my budget.

I understand that you're really trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $102. It's getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again, Alice. However, $102 is still a bit too high for me. I can offer $98 for the product. I'm really interested in making this deal work, but I'm at my absolute limit.

I understand that you're really trying to make this deal work, Bob. However, I'm getting close to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $100.50. It's my final compromise, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

I appreciate your final compromise, Alice, but I'm afraid $100.50 is still a bit too high for me. I've already made several compromises, and I'm at my absolute limit. I'm willing to walk away and buy the product from John for $80. I'm sorry it didn't work out.
